member.name: T:CommonObjectives.Client
member.summary: Client class extends the outlook ContactItem

member.summary: Get or sets the EntryID. This is the Outlook ContactItem EntryID for the contact that is a client.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Client.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the Title of the client. This is the prefix for the persons full name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Client.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the FirstName. This is the client's first name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Client.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the LastName. This is the last name of the client.

member.name: T:CommonObjectives.DayReport
member.summary: DayReport class manages data for the daily report.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.Day
member.summary: The Date value of the report.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.TotalUptime
member.summary: An int value returning the total number of minutes the system was up that day.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.TotalIdle
member.summary: An int value returning the total number of minutes the system was idle during up time.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.TotalWork
member.summary: An int value returning how many minutes of work time was determined.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.WorkItems
member.summary: A dictionary for the Objective's Totals.

member.summary: A dictionary of the unique applications from the system monitor.

member.summary: An array of the minute objects for the day.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.DayReport.HTML
member.summary: A string containing the HTML for the report.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CommonObjectives.Minute
member.summary: Minute holds data related to the minute of the day.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Index
member.summary: Index is the minute of the day. (hour * 60 + minute)

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.ActiveApplication
member.summary: The active application from the system monitor.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.ActiveApplicationTitle
member.summary: The title from the application from the system monitor.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Up
member.summary: True is the system is on.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Idle
member.summary: True if the system in an idle state. True is the screen save would be on if enabled. WARNING: The value is false when the system is off-line.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Billable
member.summary: True if the minute contains any Objective work.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.PrimaryWorkItem
member.summary: WorkItem that was deemed as the primary work item for that minute. This is currently decided by the lowest workType index.

member.summary: Empty constructor for serialization.

member.name: T:CommonObjectives.WorkItem
member.summary: WorkItem holds data related to work items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Id
member.summary: GUID Index.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Version
member.summary: The version of the WorkItem.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.ObjectiveName
member.summary: Objective name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Start
member.summary: The start time of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Finish
member.summary: The finish time of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.FilePath
member.summary: File path to the project item's location.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Name
member.summary: Project name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Description
member.summary: General description of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Notes
member.summary: Collection of notes related to the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.WorkType
member.summary: The WorkType related to the work item. This is stored here at the time of creation of the object as the WorkType can be changed.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Application
member.summary: The application type of the work item. Some work items are not computer related so have no Application type.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Minutes
member.summary: The calculated number of minutes for the work item. Some items have minimum and maximum values for this set contractually so may not be the number of minutes between the start and finish DateTimes.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Cost
member.summary: The calculated cost of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Invoiced
member.summary: A value indicating whether the item has been invoiced.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.StartSize
member.summary: A value of the size of the work item at the start. This is irreverent for non commuter based items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.FinishSize
member.summary: A value of the size of the work item at the finish. This is irreverent for non commuter based items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.IsActive
member.summary: True if the work item was active.

member.name: M:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.#ctor
member.summary: An empty constructor for serialization.

member.name: M:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for the WorkItem.
member.param: The name of the work item.
